page.title: 08MY FRIENDS' HOBBIES.
page.content: Andrew's hobby is sew-on-badges. He buys them when he visits different places.He has 146 badges.He sews them on to a blanket which keeps him warm in his tent or he hangs it on his wall. Daniel's hobby is cycling.He is in a club called Sherwood C.C. He cycles about 20 miles some weekends. Stuart's hobby is Motorcross. He rides in the England Team and has competed abroad.He has 174 trophies. William's hobby is amateur radio. It's a kind of C.B.and he can operate around the world with it.His call sign is G3YKP. Raymond's hobby is microscopes.He uses them to look at insects,plants and things like that. My Mum's hobby is knitting, I think. She has done a lot of jumpers for me.
